entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:24 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 12:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 36 %
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 7.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
